Project
Project              :	ATCC
Role		        :	Database Developer.
Duration	        :	March 2019 to Present.
        Tools Used          :        SQL, T-SQL, Power BI, SSRS, SSIS

Description	
ATCC is the premier global biological materials resource and standards organization whose mission focuses on the acquisition, authentication, production, preservation, development, and distribution of standard reference microorganisms, cell lines, and other materials. ATCC has extensive experience in the healthcare and delivering custom world-class services, which are business driven, competitive and provide value to each customer. The scope of the project was to work on ETL activities through extracting data from SQL Server database, Excel and creating different types of reports using SSRS and Dashboard using Power BI.

· Testing and reviewing the modules.

· Designing and developing SSRS Report.
